name: Suncloud Sentry Polarized Sunglasses - Unisex
description: Guard against bright sun and dull looks with these multisport shades.Polarized lenses cut glare from water, ice, sand, snow and pavement for clear vision and reduced eye strain.Polycarbonate lens material is light and shatter resistant.Polarized Grey lens provides 14-15% visible light transmission.Polarized Brown lens provides 14-15% visible light transmission.Polarized Green Mirror lens provides 11% visible light transmission.Megol nose pads grip better as they get wet.Microfibre cleaning/storage bag included.Medium fit suits average sized heads.
